prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered authoritative standing pose with arms crossed over geometric chest piece, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth. Hair or tetrahedral spike-like projections from the head incorporating tetrahedron, merkaba, flower of life patterns from sacred geometry symbolism. Outfit is unique: dark grey with high contrast and neutral grey ethereal flowing robes with geometric wind patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for depth and movement, elaborate with shifting Air element glyphs and spiral motifs and Merkaba emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like sword of severity with angular geometric blade with ethereal spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like faint wind wisps and floating geometric particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor TAHAMDO's profile: 'He who lives according to his name', Aethyr OXO, Air element, Tarot The Emperor, Sephirot Geburah, Zodiac Aries, embodying the essence: 'When TAHAMDO is invoked, all facets of the self lock into harmony utterance, act, and essence moving...' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered authoritative standing pose with arms crossed over geometric chest piece
visual_elements.head_shape: large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with crystal-like facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth
visual_elements.hair_style: tetrahedral spike-like projections from the head

outfit.base: ethereal flowing robes with geometric wind patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for depth and movement
outfit.details: Air element glyphs and spiral motifs
outfit.magical_essence: faint wind wisps and floating geometric particles

visual_elements.accessory: sword of severity with angular geometric blade
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who lives according to his name'
profile_data.essence: When TAHAMDO is invoked, all facets of the self lock into harmony utterance, act, and essence moving in perfectly principled step.
profile_data.angelic_role: Principality of Harmonious Word; leads empyrean hosts.
profile_data.form_description: A luminous tetrahedral structure representing Air's geometric precision and Aries' cardinal energy, manifesting as a multifaceted prism of translucent geometric planes that shift and reconfigure dynamically
profile_data.color_reasoning: Electric blue represents Air's intellectual clarity and Geburah's transformative power; silver-white symbolizes divine communication and Enochian angelic transmission
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometries representing divine intelligence, dimensional transition, and cosmic ordering principles
